bib.title: Results of the PolEval 2019 Shared Task 1: Recognition and Normalization of Temporal Expressions
bib.author: Kocon, Jan and Oleksy, Marcin and Bernas, Tomasz and Marcinczuk, Micha{\l}
bib.abstract: This article presents the research in the recognition and normalization of Polish temporal expressions as the result of the first PolEval 2019 shared task. Temporal information extracted from the text plays a significant role in many information extraction systems, like question answering, event recognition or text summarization. A specification for annotating Polish temporal expressions (PLIMEX) was used to prepare a completely new test dataset for the competition. PLIMEX is based on state-of-the-art solutions for English, mostly
